text: To whoever fishes this outta the surf,
To someone out there somewhere,
To the lucky owner of a free bottle,
To whoever's into strange bottles,
To the lucky duck who picks this up,

I was cleanin' my house and found
this old DIY recipe I'd thought up.

I just mighta come up with a DIY
recipe that'll change everythin'!

I was messin' around at the ol' tool
bench and I came up with this DIY
idea that you're holdin' right now.

I set my mind to makin' up the next
big thing in DIY recipes, and lo and
behold, I'd had this genius idea!

I was just zonin' out in the bathtub
when a great DIY idea popped into
my head that I had to write down!

Whoever you are, I hope you're in
the mood to craft up a brainstorm!

I just had to share it, so I stuffed it
into a bottle and floated it to you!

I could've kept this to myself, but
I decided to share anonymous-like.

My great idea's in this bottle here.
Take a chance on it. You'll see!

Lucky you! You really scored by
takin' a peek inside this bottle.
Try it out—you won't be sorry!
Don't tell nobody else about this!
Try it and see what happens!
It's so easy, anyone can do this.
Take a chance and try it out!
Wishin' you luck. –n
Your clever pal, n
Better get to it! –n
Off you go. –n
Now get to work! –n

Betcha weren't expectin' to find
a DIY recipe washed up in a bottle.
Keep an open mind, I always say.
This craftin' project is somethin'
to help you reflect... Build it, and
you'll see what I'm gettin' at.
